record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: The university grounds as seen from the top of the new heat, light and power plant of the University of Chicago.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Taken for the University of Chicago Weekly.Scanned copy is pasted onto gray paper. The original is a panorama that has been split into two halves.
